charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO POSSES WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE METHAMPHETAMINE OR A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF METHAMPHETAMINE.    Penalty:   0 to 20 Yrs  and/or $1 Million Fine; $100 CVF; At Least a 3 Yr TSR.(1)

POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE METHAMPHETAMINE OR A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF METHAMPHETAMINE.  Penalty: 0 to 20 Yrs and/or $1 Million Fine; $100 CVF; At Least a 3 Yr TSR.(2)

21: 841(a)(1), 846, &; 952  Knowingly, willfully, and unlawfully import from a place outside the United States to wit the Republic of Mexico to a place in the U.S. to wit a controlled substance approximately 29.62  kilograms of crystal methamphetamine.  Knowingly, intentionally possess with the intent to distribute the above mentioned controlled substance. Furthermore, conspire to possess with intent to distribute.
